charinfo.name: Asura Path Pein (S)
charinfo.description: Asura Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. His body style is similar to a puppet filled with hidden weapons.

abilities.name: Chakra Burst
abilities.description: Asura Path Pein (S) uses Chakra Burst and takes flight. One enemy will be dealt 20 damage and damage dealt to Asura Path Pein (S) will reduced by 25% for 2 turns. This skill becomes Crown Shockwave when used.

abilities.name: Cluster Bombs
abilities.description: Asura Path Pein (S) uses Cluster Bombs dealing 10 damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Heat Seeker
abilities.description: Asura Path Pein (S) uses Heat Seeker on himself or one ally. If the target of this skill dies the enemy that killed them will take 20 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.This skill is invisible until triggered. This skill stacks.

abilities.name: Rinnegan Reaction
abilities.description: This skill makes Asura Path Pein invulnerable for 1 turn.
